name: Elevator Action?
description:
'Elevator Action?' is a platform game where you start at the top of a building and work your way down using elevators to try and get to the switch and the bottom. There are shadows to destroy with your light pistol and people to rescue.

This is a game based off Elevator Action released in 1983 and created by Taito, Micronics, Binary Design. This version of the game has also had inspiration from the Artist James Turrell.
